extendedInfo.description: The UK's best-selling travel appâ  has landed on Android phones, so now you can instantly see when your bus is coming, at any of London's 20,000 bus stops!â¢ Bus Checker - as featured on BBC Click, The Telegraph, Guardian Online, The Independent & Wired UK â¢â Instantly see when your bus is due â Real-time information - not from timetables â Covers 20,000 bus stops! â Full route maps - see where your bus goes! â Real-time diversion/cancellation info  â Auto-locate nearest stops on map â View live arrivals on your home screen â Store your favourites â     "I'm not surprised this app has leapt to the top of the    UK travel charts since its launch" - Kate Russell, BBC Click ââ DESCRIPTION ââ You know those little black 'countdown' boxes on bus shelters? Well, with Bus Checker, you can carry them in your pocket, wherever you are - for all of London's 20,000 bus stops.  No more sprinting down the road then finding the bus is ten minutes away! So that's more time at home. Or in bed. What's more, Bus Checker doesn't use a timetable - it gets the real, live information for each bus as it moves around London; meaning it's both accurate and reliable. In addition, Bus Checker shows you accurate route maps of all London's 700 bus routes, allows you to search by place name or postcode.. ..see exactly where your bus goes, and when it's coming! ââ MAIN FEATURES: ââ â¢ Live, updated countdown display of bus arrivals. â¢ Real-time GPS map of nearest bus stops. â¢ Full route maps for all London Bus Routes - see exactly where your bus goes. â¢ Service information - diversions/closures/cancellations. â¢ Home screen widget - live arrivals for your favourite stops.â¢ Tap on bus numbers to filter the list: see screenshots. â¢ Details bus stop information - routes/map location/direction. â¢ Map/route number display - find the right bus to get you home! Download Bus Checker today - and never miss that last bus of the night again! Although if you do, we're not picking you up from the taxi rank in Morden.* _____________________________________________ Data provided by Transport for London _____________________________________________ PROBLEMS WITH THE APP? Please uninstall then re-install the app - this resolves the vast majority of issues. For more help, please see our support website or get in touch. (and please do this before leaving bad reviews! We do read every support request we receive) ______________________________________________ * - Note to tourists: Morden is at the very bottom of the Northern line on the London tube - and frequently where late-night travellers find themselves waking up.â  - Source iOS App Store & Google Play, November 2011 - June 2012

reviews.title: Non-existent support
reviews.comment: This worked when I first installed it on my HTC Explorer but after a number of updates it now stops after a minute or so.  I report it every time so that they know there is a problem.  I have uninstalled and reinstalled it several times but this makes no difference.  Contacted support but they don\'t bother to respond. 18 days now and still no response.
reviews.author: Rodney Francis

reviews.title: Good app all round
reviews.comment: Easy access but needs quicker loading and better judge of where I am. Above average
reviews.author: Vanessa Page

reviews.title: Needed this 50 years ago
reviews.comment: Since update has lost some routes and brings up an error when you try to display them. I also have a windows phone running this app and that displays the same fault. Have emailed dev  and nothing yet. So am using a free timetable that works.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does what it says on the tin. And crashes alot.
reviews.comment: Why does it crash most times you open it, and then works the second time?! No other app does this. Fix it devs!
reviews.author: Charlie Daffarn

reviews.title: Worth the money
reviews.comment: Assuming you use London buses regularly, this is probably the most useful app to have at any time. Had it for a few months now and it\'s not been wrong yet. I haven\'t had the issue with crashing personally. Galaxy S2
reviews.author: James Wakeham

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: Lovely interface and truly life-saving features. Keep it up!
reviews.author: Gloucester Shrubhill

reviews.title: Excellent and I use it everyday.
reviews.comment: This works perfectly on my S2 and has done since I bought it over a year ago. I use it going to work and I now spend hardly any time waiting for buses. The map is very useful when I am in a part of town I am not familiar with and the route feature is a great help.
reviews.author: Fiona Campbell

reviews.title: Worth every penny
reviews.comment: Delighted with this app. It takes the stress out of waiting at a stop and wondering when the bus will appear. Accurate nearly every time so far, and none of the problems that other reviewers seem to have had.
reviews.author: Mary Hawes

reviews.title: Works great on LG Optimus 4X
reviews.comment: Very fast app, no problems on LG Optimus 4X. Indispensable for London bus travellers. Make sure you save your \"favourite\"  bus stops as this is easier than using map, especially where stops are close together.
reviews.author: Paul Harrison

reviews.title: Emmanuel: Bus Checker
reviews.comment: This application really is on time, Multiple displayed bus arrivals.  Really handy if you are stranded out at night and need to know when your next bus is arriving, I can see when the bus will come before I leave home!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: The best app for live bus info. Very useful and accurate. Easy to use and the widget is awesome too.
reviews.author: Petko Blagoev

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: Pinpoint accuracy. Never fails to assume me. Never stopped working or randomly crashed. The team is superb
reviews.author: wahid khan

reviews.title: Kamir
reviews.comment: A very helpfull apps.... That helps me to check the bus timings all over the London Acurate timings
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: Of all of these types of app this beats the competition.  Alright, it costs for the full version but it\'s worth it IMO. HTC Desire (stock).  UPDATE...have to say the quitting when app is opened is very annoying, this is the apps fatal flaw. If the developer can fix this I\'ll rate higher.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is a great app for Londoners
reviews.comment: Travelling on bus has been made so much easier by this app. Everytime I have to decide whether or not I need to take a bus or cab, this comes in handy.
reviews.author: Manthan Dave

reviews.title: Good but crashes
reviews.comment: Very useful. Helps me to get to the correct bus stop for earliset arriving bus. It is a bit unstable crashes on first start every other time run.
reviews.author: sami flew

reviews.title: Works perfectly.
reviews.comment: Just the app I needed. Thanks! By the way, no crashes on the Sony Xperia Z
reviews.author: Derpy D

reviews.title: Good job
reviews.comment: Actually I think its the best one out there, good looking, ULTRA FAST and nice! I give 4 stars cause every morning I get the bus it doesn\'t give exact times, 20 mins for the next bus and 1 min later the next bus comes in 1 min and after that one there\'s one more in 19 minutes. Dunno if its TFL or the app...
reviews.author: Giannis Tsolakidis

reviews.title: Live Arrivals widget is NOT \'Live\'
reviews.comment: The live arrivals widget says a bus stop I regularly use is out of service due to buses being diverted during roadworks. This is not true, the 31 still stops there.... ....and even though it says this stop is out of service, it is still giving the arrival times for ALL the buses!! How this makes it a \'Live\' Arrivals widget is beyond me. Waste of money.
reviews.author: Paula Kokosha

reviews.title: Near perfect
reviews.comment: I use this app everyday, essential for time travel management. It crashes fairly often upon reopening but it restarts instantly. It might be something to do with my Note 2.
reviews.author: Tom Harrison
